name: NewYorker
text: The cast of Allen Reisner’s 1958 bio-pic about the composer W. C. Handy is among the most distinguished in the history of cinema. https://t.co/5vp3IWt8RJ

name: NewYorker
text: Watching the commemoration of the 1995 Srebrenica genocide from the U.S.—a country so divided and dysfunctional that it is unable to effectively respond to the coronavirus—the issues of denialism took on new meaning, @RohdeD writes. https://t.co/5XQ40zSzgZ
